general.gigTitle: design, redesign and develop a responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: WordPress Website Developer, Elementor Pro Expert
sellerCard.description:
Hi, I'm Damilola! I design and build WordPress websites using Elementor and other page builders of your choice. I have worked with industries like eCommerce, real estate, healthcare, finance, and education. My services include WordPress website design and development, WordPress setup, theme installation, website migration, and custom WordPress sites. I also work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and WooCommerce. I can also convert Figma or HTML design into WordPress.  

Letâ€™s build a clean, responsive website that fits your needs. Send me a message to get started!

description.content:
Professional WordPress Website Design and Development at Affordable Prices Delivered within 4 days! (Including Weekends and Holidays)

Yes! With this gig, your dream website is just a click away. As a WordPress Designer and Developer, I specialize in crafting responsive WordPress websites tailored to your business needs. Whether you're starting fresh or revamping/redesigning an existing site, I've got you covered. From Blogs, and business websites to dynamic E-commerce Stores, I leverage the latest tools and techniques to build user-friendly and responsive WordPress websites that resonate with your audience.


Who is this gig For? 

Businesses of any type, Real Estate Agencies or agents, E-commerce Stores, Restaurants, cafes and coffee shops, Service Providers (Electricians, Cleaning Services, Plumbers etc.), and startups.


Here's what you can expect from my Gig:

High-Quality Design

Responsive Development

Clear Communication

Satisfaction Guaranteed

Post-Launch Support


Place an Order and submit the requirements to get started.


Note: Prices may vary depending on each client's custom requirements, Contact me if you have any questions or inquiries.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide to get started
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You'll need to provide any content you want featured on your site, including text, images, and videos. Additionally, if you have specific design requirements or preferences, feel free to share those with me. Once I have the necessary materials, we can begin crafting your responsive website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I donâ€™t have the content for my website yet, can you start developing the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will add dummy content so that you would be able to replace that with your own content in the future. The content will be dummy "Lorum Ipsum" and will not be relevant to any industry.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you able to edit the site after it's launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: As part of my service, I offer post-launch support to ensure your website remains up-to-date and reflects any changes in your business or brand. Whether you need to update content, make design tweaks, or add new features, I'm here to assist you every step of the way.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is the website you design mobile-friendly
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, without a doubt! I prioritize creating websites that are fully responsive, ensuring seamless viewing and interaction across all devices, including mobile phones and tablets. Your site will adapt effortlessly to different screen sizes, providing an optimal user experience for all visitors.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your availability for taking on new website design projects?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My availability varies depending on the workload, but I strive to accommodate all clients in a timely manner. Feel free to reach out to discuss your project timeline and requirements, and I'll do my best to accommodate your needs. Don't hesitate to contact me to get started on your project

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting services for the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While I don't provide hosting services directly, I can certainly offer recommendations for reliable hosting providers based on your specific needs and requirements. I'll guide you through the process of selecting the right hosting plan to ensure your website performs optimally and remains secure.

packageList.title: Landing Page or Blog Website
packageList.description: Blog website or Landing page with upto 7-10 sections for starter business

packageList.title: Business Website
packageList.description: High Quality WordPress Website with upto 5 - 8 Pages for Small Businesses and Startups

packageList.title: E-commerce Website/Online Shop
packageList.description: High Quality E-commerce website with upto 15 - 20 pages & Products using Woocommerce or Shopify

reviews.comment: Very good job was done with professionalism, quick responsiveness and very proactive and resourceful approach. Our business site was properly modernized and done on time.
Great job as always! thank you.
Damilola delivered exceptional work with great professionalism and attention to detail. Fluent communication, politeness, and proactive approach. Highly recommended

consultationData.description: I specialize in WordPress design, development and Elementor services. Before our call, please outline your website needs. Expect a collaborative discussion focused on optimizing your online presence
